description: POST-CONFLICT SOCIO-ECONOMIC REHABILITATION OF SOUTHERN LEBANON

subproject.description: The project aims at supporting residents (men and women) of mine-affected communities having the skills needed to obtain jobs, while assisting in the establishment of cooperatives with the capacity to operate small-businesses in communities. Municipalities will be enabled to enhance community participation in planning and management of development projects, and youth groups contribute to the sustainability of community development by participating in social reintegration and reconciliation activities.
subproject.title: Mine Affected Communities

title: SOCIO-ECONOMIC REHABILITATION
